description: Simplify GDPR compliance with the Data Erasure Request Form.
name: Data Erasure Request Form

steps.title: Data Erasure Request Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to request the erasure of your personal data. Your request will be processed promptly in accordance with data protection regulations. Thank you for your cooperation.

blocks.label: Requester's Full Name
blocks.help: Enter the full name of the individual making the data erasure request.
blocks.name: name

blocks.label: Requester's Contact Information
blocks.help: Provide contact details such as email address and phone number for communication regarding the request.
blocks.name: contact_information

blocks.label: Requester's Address
blocks.help: Provide the postal address of the requester for mailing any confirmation or follow-up.
blocks.name: address

blocks.label: Requester's Identification
blocks.help: Attach a copy of a valid identification document (e.g., passport, driving licence) to verify the requester's identity.
blocks.name: identification

blocks.label: Preferred Method of Communication
blocks.help: Specify how the requester prefers to be contacted regarding the erasure request.
blocks.name: delivery_method

blocks.label: Description of Data to be Erased
blocks.help: Specify the personal data that the requester wishes to have erased.
blocks.name: description_of_data

blocks.label: Reason for Data Erasure
blocks.help: Provide a brief explanation of why the data erasure is being requested.
blocks.name: reason_for_erasure

blocks.label: Additional Comments
blocks.help: Optional: Provide any additional information or context related to the data erasure request.
blocks.name: comments

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm the authenticity of the request and agree to the terms and conditions.
blocks.name: signature
